body_html: TensorFlow assumes that it has much more knowledge (basically full knowledge) about the user code than we do. There's no way for us to determine automatically which Variables should be compute or not (unless you take care of annotating them for us), because we don't know which optimizer will you call next/in some time. Thanks for the proposal but I don't think this is feasible. If you have any concrete implementation ideas please reopen/let us know.

body: TensorFlow assumes that it has much more knowledge (basically full knowledge) about the user code than we do. There's no way for us to determine automatically which Variables should be compute or not (unless you take care of annotating them for us), because we don't know which optimizer will you call next/in some time. Thanks for the proposal but I don't think this is feasible. If you have any concrete implementation ideas please reopen/let us know.
